document_data.mainbody:
Tamlith was a Rashemaar hathran telthor whose spirit was tied to the Red Tree within Immil Vale as of the late 14 century DR.
Tamlith, along with her fellow hathran telthor Imsha, gave advice to other wychlaran who visited the Red Tree. Both spirits disliked simple chatter, so only aided those witches with serious concerns involving Rashemens safety.
